Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Annunciation:

Text.Language: <ere y/e~tacjem h~mot: P[oic sop neme: ,ere y/e~tac[i n~ten piaggeloc: m~v~rasi m~pikocmoc.
Hail to her who has found grace, the Lord is with you. Hail to her who received from the angel, the joy of the world.
